==== Notes ====
(1) - External VGA port enabled by pressing Fn+F7 or Restarting computer with monitor plugged in. Default is mirror.
(2) - Changing monitor settings via Gnome interface usually results corrupted config file. Usually, the only solution is to restore a backup config file.
